xlum 0.1.0

Read, Write, and Convert xlum Data

xlum-package.Rd

Support for the XLUM-file format for exchange and long-term preservation of luminescence data. Facilitated are the import and export of XLUM-files and the conversion from other ASCII and binary formats commonly used to store luminescence (dating) data.

Details

Funding

Between 2020–2022, the work of Sebastian Kreutzer as maintainer of the package has received funding from the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme under the Marie Skłodowska-Curie grant agreement No 844457 (CREDit), and the work was carried out at the Geography & Earth Sciences, Aberystwyth University (United Kingdom)
